title: Sign Me In
description: Attendance tracking web application that allows members of organizations to mark themselves present and displays the results live.

title: Focus Up
description: Desktop application for Mac and Windows that allows users to block distracting websites across their entire computer for a user-specified length of time.

title: Reddit Sentiment Analysis
description: Application which receives all comments posted to a variety of subreddits in real-time, performs sentiment analysis, and determines the subreddit's average sentiment for each presidential candidate.

title: Where In Our City
description: Web application that allows users to connect with locals in a city to learn about events and receive personal recommendations for a variety of categories such as shopping, dining, and volunteering.
